Namespace: ePeekTheme

ePeekTheme

The closure returned by the theme
Source:
  • default.js, line 48

Example

	// Typically, it is used as follows:
	var gB = epeek().width(920); // other methods can be included here
	var gBTheme = epeek_theme(); // other methods can be included here
	gBTheme(gB, document.getElementById('DOM_element_id');

Methods

<static> isLocation(location) → {Boolean}

isLocation determines if the argument looks like a location of the form species:chr:from-to or false otherwise
Parameters:
Name Type Description
location String The string to be tested
Source:
  • default.js, line 485
Returns:
If the string looks like a location or not
Type
Boolean

<static> parseLocation(location) → {ePeekTheme}

parseLocation takes a string as input and guesses a location setting ePeek.species, ePeek.chr. ePeek.from and ePeek.to.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
location String A string of the form species:chr:from-to

<static> show_title(boolean) → {ePeekTheme}

show_title sets the visibility of the title. This title is set by ePeekTheme.title. Its argument is evaluated to 'true' or 'false'.

<static> title(title) → {ePeekTheme}

title gets/sets the title of the widget. If no argument is provided, returns the default title for the widget ("e!Peek").
